Faculty_Participates_in.description: This table records the participation of faculty members in various activities, linking faculty IDs to activity IDs.

columns.FacID: The unique identifier for each faculty member participating in activities.
columns.actid: The unique identifier for each activity in which faculty members participate.

Student666.description: This table stores information about students, including their personal details, academic major, advisor, and city of residence.

columns.StuID: A unique identifier assigned to each student.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.Sex: The gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Major: The academic major code that indicates the student's field of study.
columns.Advisor: The unique identifier of the student's academic advisor.
columns.city_code: A code representing the city where the student resides.

Activity.description: The Activity table contains records of various activities available in the system, which can be referenced by participants and faculty members.

columns.actid: A unique identifier for each activity, ensuring that every record can be distinctly recognized and referenced throughout related tables.
columns.activity_name: The name of the activity, providing a clear designation of what the activity involves, such as sports, games, or other recreational activities.

Participates_in.description: This table records the participation of students in various activities, linking student IDs with activity IDs.

columns.stuid: The unique identifier for each student participating in an activity.
columns.actid: The unique identifier for each activity in which students can participate.

Faculty.description: This table contains information about faculty members, including their personal details, academic rank, and contact information.

columns.FacID: A unique identifier for each faculty member.
columns.Lname: The last name of the faculty member.
columns.Fname: The first name of the faculty member.
columns.Rank: The academic rank or title of the faculty member, indicating their position within the institution.
columns.Sex: The gender of the faculty member, represented by a single character.
columns.Phone: The phone extension number assigned to the faculty member for contact purposes.
columns.Room: The room number where the faculty member's office is located.
columns.Building: The name of the building in which the faculty member's office is situated.

columns.StuID: 唯一标识学生的整数ID，范围在1001到1035之间，用作主键以确保每位学生的记录都是唯一的。
columns.LName: 学生姓氏的字符串，最大长度为12个字符。此列用于存储学生的家庭名称，以便于识别和排序。
columns.Fname: 学生名字的字符串，最大长度为12个字符。此列记录学生的个人名称，利于个性化的交流和标识。
columns.Age: 学生年龄的整数值，范围为16到27岁。此列用于分析学生的年龄分布，以便于制定适合年龄段的教育措施。
columns.Sex: 学生性别的单字符表示，'M'代表男性，'F'代表女性。此列用于统计性别比例，帮助理解学生群体的性别分布情况。
columns.Major: 学生主修专业的整数标识符，代表不同的学科领域，范围为50到600。此列用于分析学生的学术背景及其选择的专业。
columns.Advisor: 学生的学业顾问的整数ID，用于标识指导学生的教师或顾问。此列便于管理和跟踪学生的学业指导情况。
columns.city_code: 学生居住城市的三字母代码，表示学生所在的城市。此列用于了解学生的地域分布，辅助进行相关的市场和发展分析。

Student777.table_description: 此表记录了学生的基本信息，包括ID、姓名、年龄、性别、专业、学业顾问及居住城市，旨在为学校管理、学术分析及个性化辅导提供数据支持，便于进一步的学生服务与教育政策的制定。

Student挺好的-中文.description: This table holds information about students enrolled in the institution, including personal details and academic associations.

columns.StuID: Unique identifier assigned to each student.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.Age: The age of the student at the time of enrollment.
columns.Sex: The gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Major: The code representing the student's field of study.
columns.Advisor: The identifier of the academic advisor assigned to the student.
columns.city_code: The code representing the city of the student's residence.

columns.StuID: A unique identifier assigned to each student.
columns.LName: The last name of the student.
columns.Fname: The first name of the student.
columns.Sex: The gender of the student, represented by a single character.
columns.Major: The code representing the student's major field of study.
columns.Advisor: The identifier for the student's academic advisor.
columns.city_code: A code representing the city where the student is from.

Student.table_description: The Student table contains information about individual students, including their identifying information, demographics, major field of study, advisor, and place of origin.
